评论详情: This item is thicker than expected and quite warm. The quality is better than others I own. The colors are nice perky blues. It is just perfect for the beach or a nighttime campfire.
Runs on the small side. Wish it was a bit bigger
It’s a nice Baja. Wasn’t really the color scheme I thought it would be. The yellow is super yellow.

I gave this to my granddaughter who is 14. She put it on and didnt take it off until she had to. She likes comfortable, simple styles and this fit her to a T. The smile on her face was the best thing a grandma could ask for

I love this style for casual wear. This is a bit more upscale than what I've bought in Mexico in that it's well made and so soft. Colors are gorgeous & bright. Gotten a lot of compliments & pairs well with leggings or jeans.

I bought it one size bigger so it was loose and long. Exactly what I was looking for! Love the pattern just wish the fabric was inside out when it was made so the pattern would be more defined and the soft part would be to skin.

I have been looking for a 100% cotton baja hoodie/drug rug for about a year.  I had purchased the recycled plastic bottle ones and they are great for rough wear since they cost under $20 and are pretty indestructable.  But I wanted a cotton one because cotton feels better and looks better.  This was the one.  Not a bad price and i love the colors. I do wish that the brushed side was on the inside and the non-brushed side was on the outside.  But this is a small thing.  I am a female, 5'4" 130 LB.  The medium fits me just a little loose as I wanted it to.  The sleeves, as on every baja hoodie I have purchased are way long.  Just fold em over and they are fine.  The hood is actually nice and big.  Really covers my head.  And I love the wooden toggle buttons: Look cool and are very functional.  Oh and the hood draw string actually pulls the hood close around your face.  Again something that I have found lacking in other baja hoodies.
I gave this as a gift.  She loved it.  Very soft and nicely made.

评论概述: Runs slightly smaller than I expected.Really great quality though
评论详情: Really soft, good quality. Fit a little snug
Absolutely wonderful! I love it! The colors are vibrant and the material is very soft. Fits just right and seems to be sturdy. I know I'm going to wear this a lot.
Tout d abord je remercie  encore Amazon d avoir accéléré la commande ,trop top,car eu un soucis de scan,été livré rapidement,sinon super le baja,chaud,doux,RAS

The product itself is great, it looks nice & feels nice, however, the sizing is quite a ways off.  I bought 2 sizes bigger so that it would be baggy for the person I bought it for & they couldn't fit in it...  My suggestion to any future purchasers is to go for 3 sizes bigger than your actual size & if they don't do that size, go find a different one.
Wear a medium  ordered a large and still too small. Good quality tho
Il est génial
An sich ein tolles Teil, jedoch geht es nach dem ersten Waschen ziemlich ein, außer an den Ärmel. Passt gerade noch so halbwegs

Thick cotton woven top is so comfortable. Sleeves were too long but I just turned the ends up. Warm when it’s cold and the chunky woven threads allow air through to help cool when too warm. Just lovely.

I love this pullover! I ordered my usual size and it fits like it was made for me. The blue is so nice. It’s a heavier weight shirt perfect for Canadian winter, spring and fall. The sewing is so well done that it  will last a long time.
Nice top but only just fits, I could of returned for larger size but two lazy x
Beautiful colors. Well made
It's perfect for fall winter very well made and heavy love it
Warm, thick material, beautiful colors. Might fleece a bit after washing machine, but I took the risk as I'm too lazy to hand wash it. Would definitely recommend
Molto bello, ben rifinito, buon cotone. Taglia conforme. Spedizione perfetta e personale della consegna gentile e sorridente.
Gute Qualität und alle Nähte schön genäht. Gibt schön warm in der Übergangszeit oder abends. Ein toller Hoodie! Passt gut, ichhabe oben grösse 44 und habe XL bestellt. Klare Kaufempfehlung!
If you have big boobies this will not fit you! Had to send back.
I love this too. It’s comfy and the colours are amazing

Besser als erwartet!!! Schön kuschelig warm

An sich ganz schön und passt, aber irgendwie wirkt es, als hätte dich da jemand vernäht. Der kuschelige eher blasse Teil ist außen und der eher rauhe, aber farbig knalligere Teil ist innen. Wie auf links gedreht.
Amazing value for money daughter loves it

Livraison rapide (commandé mercredi reçu lundi). Made in Népal, 100% coton, taille un peu grand mais ce n'est pas bizarre si on veut le porter large. Par contre il est droit et non cintré comme voudrait l'indiquer la photo. Sinon les couleurs sont respecté.
Bought for my daughter. Just like the ones we had in the '90's. Thanks.

Hab ihn in s/w und größe s bestellt. Versandt ging recht fix. Sieht genauso aus wie auf dem Bild. Fällt etwas größer aus, aber das ist bei diesen Pullovern ja normal. Ansonsten passt er sehr gut. 2 Punkte Abzug weil er vor dem Waschen wirklich sehr stark nach Chemie roch und die Qualität der Nähte schon etwas zu wünschen übrig lässt. Kann man zwar easy selbst reparieren, dennoch finde ich ihn dafür dann etwas zu teuer. Deshalb 3 Sternchen. Wem das allerdings nichts aumacht, dem kann ich den Pullover nur empfehlen!
looks good

Decent material and comfortable. Not warm enough to wear without something thicker underneath. Main probel was there was a huge hole under the arm big enough to stick your head through. Not sure if they're all like this but had to get it refunded. Hope to get an intact replacement at some point
